description: Wang, Cheng is a professor in College of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering of Xiamen University.
The Wang Group in XMU currently includes one professors, one research assistant & engineer, eleven PhD students, eight Master students, and one postdoc.
The Wang Group is doing interdisciplinary research in the field between synthetic inorganic chemistry and physical chemistry.

news.content: 汪骋教授课题组在二维金属有机单层(MOL)的表面修饰研究中取得新进展，相关论文以“Surface Modification of Two-Dimensional Metal-Organic Layers Creates Biomimetic Catalytic Microenvironments for Selective Oxidation”为题发表于Angew. Chem. Int. Ed. (DOI: 10.1002/anie.201703675)，并被选为frontispiece。
